name: nsp-reporter-checkstyle
description: Checkstyle-compatible reporter for the Node Security Project

scripts.test-dist: npm run prepare-compile && npm run compile && npm run mocha-dist && npm run nsp
scripts.test-local: npm run lint && npm run mocha-local && npm run nsp
scripts.prepare-compile: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/src/ && mkdir -p dist/test
scripts.compile: babel --no-comments --out-dir dist/src/ src/ && babel --copy-files --out-dir dist/test/ test/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run mocha-local && npm run nsp && npm run prepare-compile && npm run compile && npm run mocha-dist
